The fossil record is just that. A record. No transmutations from one genus to another have ever been found in the fossil record to support the theory of evolution. Magical leaps from one genus to another through metaphysical naturalism will not stand the test of the scientific method. So called missing links have never been found in the fossil records. All fossils share one common fact - Rapid Burial. Evolutionists claim that when animals died in the past they just lay on the ground and were gradually buried and fossilized. This claim is not supported by any evidence. Even a dead elephant - a huge beast - lasts less than 5 years on the ground. Millions of animals die all over the planet but you never see their bodies turning into fossils. Fossil elephants are evidence for drowning and rapid burial under mud, sand, and sediment in a world wide flood. Exactly what we see here. Dead elephants are evidence for decomposition
